title: Client says 0KBps
body:
I've been having a constant issue where my patcher always gets stuck at 69% it just says downloading at 0KBps and when I close and re-open it gets stuck at 33% i'm really desperate for help anything would be appreciated.

-Penta Crap

replies.body: mine does the same thing but after an hour or so it updates completely so if I were you I would just wait a while.
